item.title: Jets' Breece Hall breaks free for 59-yard TD, shrinking deficit against Patriots | NFL Highlights
item.description: Breece Hall broke free for 59-yard TD, to shrink the New York Jets' deficit against the New England Patriots.

item.title: Trey McBride Sets NFL Single-Season Record for Most Receptions by a Tight End
item.description: While the Arizona Cardinals' season has been one to forget, tight end Trey McBride has made NFL history.

item.title: Colts' Philip Rivers throws 5-yard TD to Mo Alie-Cox to retake lead against Jaguars | NFL Highlights
item.description: Philip Rivers threw a 5-yard TD pass to Mo Alie-Cox that gave the Indianapolis Colts a 17-14 lead against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
